mapper.select: SELECT VR.*, EE.EMP_NM FROM VACATION_REQ VR INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE EE ON VR.VR_EMP_NO = EE.EMP_NO WHERE VR_STATUS = 'APPR'

SELECT B.*, E.EMP_NM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT VR_ID, VR_START_TS, VR_END_TS, VR_STATUS, VR_APP_DT, VR_TYPE, VR_EMP_NO, VR_PERIOD, VR_REQ_DT FROM VACATION_REQ WHERE VR_STATUS = 'APP' ) A ORDER BY VR_START_TS DESC ) B JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON B.VR_EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO
SELECT VR_ID, VR_START_TS, VR_END_TS, VR_STATUS, VR_APP_DT, VR_TYPE, VR_EMP_NO, VR_PERIOD, VR_REQ_DT FROM VACATION_REQ WHERE VR_EMP_NO = #{vrEmpNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY VR_START_TS DESC
SELECT VR.VR_EMP_NO, VR.VR_START_TS, VR.VR_END_TS, VR.VR_TYPE, VR.VR_RSN, E.EMP_NM, VR.VR_PERIOD FROM VACATION_REQ VR INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON VR.VR_EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO WHERE VR.VR_ID = #{vrId}
mapper.update: UPDATE VACATION_REQ SET VR_STATUS = #{vrStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VR_REJ_RSN = #{vrRejRsn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VR_APP_DT = CASE WHEN #{vrStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} = 'APPR' THEN SYSDATE ELSE VR_APP_DT END WHERE VR_ID = #{vrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT VR_TYPE, COUNT(*) as TYPE_COUNT FROM VACATION_REQ WHERE VR_EMP_NO IN ( SELECT EMP_NO FROM employee WHERE EMP_NM = '김인사' ) GROUP BY VR_TYPE ORDER BY VR_TYPE
